name: National Geographic Bug Catcher Kit for Kids - Kids Bug Habitat with Magnified Viewer, Bug Catcher, Tweezers & Learning Guide, Insect Habitat, Outdoor Toys, Kids Bug Catching Kit, Bug Box
short_description: CATCH BUGS & OBSERVE THEM UP CLOSE - With this bug catcher and habitat kit, kids can capture bugs and insects, then watch them through the habitat's magnified viewers. The bug catcher, tweezers, and net make it easy to catch bugs of all types.

MAKE THE PERFECT BUG HABITAT - The bug habitat provides a 360° view and includes a removable base, easy-open lid with latches, and 2 magnifying viewers. The base provides a place for natural objects to make bugs feel at home while they're observed.

2 BUILT-IN MAGNIFYING GLASSES - The magnified viewers are designed to offer up-close observation of the bugs you catch. The larger, stationary magnifier lets kids see their bugs up close, while the other telescopes and moves to watch bugs in action!

EVERYTHING KIDS NEED - This bug catching kit includes everything kids need to catch and observe bugs in their natural state: habitat container and latching lid with magnified viewers and removable base, scissor-style bug catcher, net, and tweezers.
